tools.name: wikipathways_search_pathways
tools.description: Search for biological pathways in WikiPathways by keyword.

tools.name: wikipathways_get_pathway
tools.description: Lookup a pathway by WikiPathways CURIE (e.g., WP:WP534). Returns full pathway record.

tools.name: wikipathways_get_pathways_for_gene
tools.description: Find all pathways containing a given gene.

tools.name: wikipathways_get_pathway_components
tools.description: Get all molecular components (genes, metabolites) in a pathway.
